conversation.question: How many window(s) are in this room?
How many tv(s) are in this room?
How many door(s) are in this room?
How many cabinet(s) are in this room?
How many chair(s) are in this room?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (door, chair, mirror, rug) is the closest to the cabinet in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (cabinet, tv, rug, chair) is the closest to the mirror in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (mirror, cabinet, door, rug) is the closest to the tv in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (window, rug, door, table) is the closest to the cabinet in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (table, chair, window, mirror) is the closest to the door in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the door and facing the closest mirror, is the closest rug to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the mirror and facing the closest table, is the closest chair to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the cabinet and facing the closest door, is the closest tv to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
